Title: Apple Supplier Foxconn Steps Up Investment Outside China, As Consumer Electronics Demand Dips
Description: Apple Inc supplier Foxconn on Wednesday said it plans to ramp up investment outside of China and efforts to attract automakers to its contract manufacturing business, as the company reported weaker demand for consumer electronics.
